: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus Prime(via commlink): If you wish my love. There isn't anything going on right now though. We are just waiting for the plague to blow on. The real trouble has yet to come...
 airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Nightlight:

you need all the maximals vailables... I'm going"
